title: Guardian
description: Companion Novel to Deception (Fey Court Trilogy, #1)Ian's POV and background all the way back before the prophecy was made that Grace would be his betrothed queen of the Fey Seelie summer court. The devoted Ian may be quiet on the outside, but his emotions are raging on the inside for his sarcastically curious green-eyed queen to be.
author: Cyndi Goodgame
